name: Temporal Paradox
description:
Short story (No spoilers)

A game where everything is just not right. 
Explore the mysteries of the church and discoverd dark things about yourself.

Warnings or something

** I don't recommend the webGL build. Its really wonky**

(But do whatever you like)

This is a dark game. i guess

Info

I made this on my own so don't expect to much. Sadly I had to scrap a lot of idea's but it's still a pretty fun game.

Hope you enjoy or veel speel plezier!
